title: Basic Usage
content: Note that the User component requests mock data, which cannot be queried by other users. Use the real service during development.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Multi-User
content: Set the multiple property to enable the multi-user mode.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Collapse Tag
content: Set the multiple property to enable the multi-user mode. Use collapse-tags to configure whether to display collapsed tags in multi-user mode. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: User selector options can be copied
content: You can select an option in the tag-selectable text box with the mouse, and then press Ctrl + C or right-click to copy it.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: User selector options can be copied
content: After the copyable attribute is set, all tag text contents can be copied and separated by commas.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Disabled
content: Set the disabled property to disable the User component.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Exceeding prompt
content: Set collapse-show-overflow-tooltip This attribute takes effect only when cache is set to true.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Value Separator
content: You can use the value-split attribute to specify the separator between different users in the value obtained for multiple users. The default value is ,. You can use the text-split attribute to specify the text separator that matches the input in multi-user mode. The default value is ,, and the value can be !~%(=+^{/}).!]<->[\,:*#; .
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Value Field Mapping
content: The value-field attribute specifies the format of the obtained value. The default value is userId and userAccount are also included.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Display Field Mapping
content: You can use the text-field attribute to specify the field of the user to be displayed.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Cache User
content: The cache attribute specifies whether user data is cached. The default value is cached. The cache-key attribute can be used to customize the cache key value. The default value is tiny-user. The cache-fields property is used to specify which user data is cached.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Delayed loading
content: The delay attribute specifies the loading delay, in milliseconds.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Load after the specified length is entered.
content: You can use the suggest-length attribute to specify the number of characters to start requesting services.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Value change event
content: The user type can be obtained through the change event.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: User query error message
content: The error event can be used to obtain the input that fails to be queried.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Custom Option Text
content: Sets the custom drop-down option text through the options slot.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Custom Service
content: You can customize the user service through the service attribute. When a user enters an accurate account in the text box, the user is displayed in the drop-down menu. The data sequence in the drop-down list box during sort-by-fetch-data association is the same as that returned by the interface.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Custom Sorting
content: uses the sortable attribute to reference sortablejs for sorting.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.

title: Size Settings
content: You can use the size attribute to specify the size of the text box, including medium, small, and mini.
findIntroStr: The Select selector component is used to query users, including single-user query and multi-user query.
